Never entertain the thought that an honest, truthful physician cannot succeed. Such a sentiment dishonors the God of 
                                                                           129
truth and righteousness. He can succeed; for he has God and heaven on his side. Let every bribe to dissimulate be sternly refused. Hold fast your integrity in the strength of the grace of Christ, and He will fulfill His word to you.--C.T. 485, 486.
